channel.title: Need help
channel.description:
Ok so I'm setting up a test server but I can't get on there. It says 'path not specified'.
What I have done:
NO-ip (and downloaded duc) downloaded the latest jdk updated my classpath and path
Do I need to port forward just for me to connect to the server? It's not gonna be online, just a test server?
I did try to port forward but it didn't work :S
Please help me.

item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @hellspawn867 hellspawn867
item.description:
@hellspawn867 wrote:

I have sorted that now. The server was saying it. I edited the file and it was linking to the jre1.0.8_20 instead of jdk1.0.0_20. Thanks for the reply!

Read full topic

item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @Bl3nd Bl3nd
item.description:
@Bl3nd wrote:

Firstly, what is your idea of a ‘test’ server? Are you saying that you want only you to be able to log in or do you want others to be on also?
If you want only you to be able to log in, then no need to port forward. Just put the ip as local host: 127.0.0.1

Secondly, what says ‘path not specified’? The client/server compiler or the client/server run?

Read full topic
